short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redirect YouTube Shorts to the regular player for a full-featured viewing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Shorts Redirector is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your YouTube experience. With this extension, you can automatically redirect YouTube Shorts videos to the regular video player, giving you access to a full-featured interface with better controls, comments, and additional features unavailable in the Shorts player. Perfect for those who prefer a consistent viewing experience across all YouTube content, YouTube Shorts Redirector ensures you never miss out on the features you love. Install now and take control of how you watch!
